food.name: Caprese Canvas
Caprese Canvas
food.description: Fresh mozzarella, tomato, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze, on a canvas of arugula.

food.name: Inventor's Insalata
Inventor's Insalata
food.description: A mix of greens, artichoke hearts, olives, and sun-dried tomatoes, dressed in a lemon-herb vinaigrette.

food.name: Sculptor's Ciabatta Bites
Sculptor's Ciabatta Bites
food.description: Toasted ciabatta, topped with ricotta, pear, and honey, sprinkled with crushed walnuts.

food.name: Renaissance Antipasto
Renaissance Antipasto
food.description: A selection of Italian meats, cheeses, and marinated vegetables, perfect for sharing.

food.name: Da Vinci Dip Trio
Da Vinci Dip Trio
food.description: Hummus, olive tapenade, and roasted red pepper dip served with artisanal bread.

food.name: Medici Meatball Sub
Medici Meatball Sub
food.description: Homemade meatballs in marinara sauce, topped with melted provolone on a toasted baguette.

food.name: Florentine Chicken Pesto Panini
Florentine Chicken Pesto Panini
food.description: Grilled chicken, mozzarella, tomatoes, and pesto pressed in a ciabatta.

food.name: Venetian Veggie Wrap
Venetian Veggie Wrap
food.description: Roasted vegetables, goat cheese, and arugula wrapped in a spinach tortilla, served with a side of pesto.

food.name: Tuscan Tuna Melt
Tuscan Tuna Melt
food.description: Tuna, capers, and red onions, with a touch of lemon aioli, melted with fontina cheese on sourdough.

food.name: Minestrone Masterpiece
Minestrone Masterpiece
food.description: A hearty vegetable and bean soup, simmered in a tomato-based broth.

food.name: Sfumato Squash Soup
Sfumato Squash Soup
food.description: Butternut squash soup with a hint of nutmeg and cream, creating a smooth, velvety texture.

food.name: Mona Lisa Margherita Pizza
Mona Lisa Margherita Pizza
food.description: A classic margherita pizza, with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.

food.name: Codex Carbonara
Codex Carbonara
food.description: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy egg sauce with pancetta and Parmesan, sprinkled with pepper.

food.name: Vitruvian Veal Milanese
Vitruvian Veal Milanese
food.description: Breaded veal cutlets, fried to golden perfection, served with a lemon wedge and arugula salad.

food.name: Sistine Salmon
Sistine Salmon
food.description: Oven-roasted salmon with a herb crust, served alongside roasted Mediterranean vegetables.

food.name: Gallery Gnocchi
Gallery Gnocchi
food.description: Potato gnocchi in a sage and butter sauce, garnished with grated Parmesan.

food.name: Last Supper Lemon Tiramisu
Last Supper Lemon Tiramisu
food.description: A citrusy twist on the classic tiramisu, layered with lemon mascarpone and ladyfingers.

food.name: Inventive Italian Gelato
Inventive Italian Gelato
food.description: A selection of house-made gelatos, featuring both classic and inventive flavors.

food.name: Raphael's Ricotta Cheesecake
Raphael's Ricotta Cheesecake
food.description: A light, fluffy cheesecake made with ricotta, drizzled with a berry compote.

food.name: Florentine Fruit Tart
Florentine Fruit Tart
food.description: A buttery tart shell filled with pastry cream and topped with fresh, seasonal fruits.

food.name: Da Vinci's Dark Chocolate Mousse
Da Vinci's Dark Chocolate Mousse
food.description: A rich and velvety dark chocolate mousse, garnished with gold leaf for a touch of elegance.
